00037 void signal_handler(int signal);
00038 bool quit_signal = false;

00040 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00041 {
00042 
00043     //This is the default configuration file
00044     string cfg_file("../config/cavecanem.xml");
00045     
00046     plugin_manager *manager;
00047     
00048     //Associate signals to the signal handler
00049     signal(SIGHUP,  signal_handler); //Terminal is closed
00050     signal(SIGTERM, signal_handler); //Terminate
00051     signal(SIGINT,  signal_handler); //Interrupt
00052     signal(SIGQUIT, signal_handler); //Quit
00053     signal(SIGABRT, signal_handler); //Abort
00054     // signal(SIGSEGV, signal_handler); //Segmentation Violation
00055    
00056     try {
00057         manager = new plugin_manager(cfg_file);
00058     }
00059     catch(exception &e) {
00060         cerr << e.what() << endl;
00061         return 0;
00062     }
00063 
00064     cout << "Starting Cave Canem Publisher..." << endl;
00065 
00066     //We publish information and terminate in case of receiving a quit signal
00067     while(!quit_signal) {
00068         manager->publish_plugins_information();
00069     }
00070     
00071     delete(manager);
00072 
00073     return 1;
00074 }

00082 void signal_handler(int signal)
00083 {
00084     cerr << "Received (Signal " << signal << "), ...";
00085     cerr << " Terminating program" << endl;
